purpose: describes human body poses for sdxl prompts

categories.neutral: basic standing, sitting, kneeling, and reference stances for stable composition
categories.gestures: hand and arm signals or minor posture cues that modify expression
categories.emotional: dramatic, introspective, or mood-heavy poses conveying clear feelings
categories.dynamic: movement-rich action, dance, and athletic poses captured mid-motion
categories.directional: orientation to camera or scene; turns, leans, framing, and angle-driven poses
categories.quirky: humorous, meme-like, or surreal setups and exaggerated situational poses
